issues.title: Error when clicking on "add hub"
issues.body:
After clicking on a hub in .../?/hub-list I get

 Internal error: Exception: Merger site (Kiwipedia) does not have permission for merged site: 17FjMvAGAWAHxUohzk5HEq5EgjoCXnXV19 (None)
UiWebsocket.py line 217 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 150 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 127 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 40

issues.title: Auto import when clicking on a wikipedia internal link
issues.body:
In many wikipedia articles are links to other wikipedia articles. It would be great if it could auto download them automatically when clicking on such a link.
Example link:  http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/wiki/en/additive-map

issue_comments.body: after reloading the website, I get no error anymore and see the page /?/wiki/en/home
this is very much related to #1@16HcyFK8526ZYJBKPpSDCbpJv6WWBNvENj
